rooms.description: Spacious living area with Vastu aligned entrance; features an open floor plan and large windows to enhance natural light
Modern kitchen designed with ergonomics in mind; includes a pantry area; placed in the southeast for prosperity according to Vastu.
Primary bedroom with an attached bathroom and walk-in closet; positioned in the north-west for positive energy alignment.
Additional bedroom located in the southwest as per Vastu principles to enhance stability.
Second additional bedroom ensuring privacy and ample space; also positioned for positive energy flow.
Dedicated home office space with soundproofing features and sufficient lighting; situated away from the main living areas to ensure quiet working environment.
Guest bathroom accessible via corridor; includes essential fixtures and tiled flooring.
Additional guest bedroom designed for hosting visitors; positioned in a serene corner of the house following Vastu guidelines.
Small utility room for laundry and storage; placed conveniently adjacent to the kitchen.
A dedicated swimming pool area designed as a central feature of the farmhouse with ample patio space and landscaping to complement the natural surroundings.
